item.title: VisiMisi
item.dc:creator: bahalwan
item.content:encoded:
SekalaNiskala Academy

Menu
  • Home
  • Profil
    • Visi & Misi
    • History
    • Academy Life
  • Information
    • Contact Us
    • Academy
  • News & Event

Visi & Misi

Guiding Thought and Goals of SekalaNiskala Academy
SekalaNiskala Academy, upholding the great banner of Xi Jinping Thought on Socialism with Chinese Characteristics for a New Era, deeply learning and implementing the spirit of the 19th National Congress of the CPC and National Conference on Education, and carefully implementing the provincial and municipal significant decisions and arrangements on the leap forward development of higher education, adheres to the strengthening of morality education, and aims at comprehensively deepening reform and innovation, strengthening connotative construction and enhancing educational quality. All party members, faculty staff and students should be united and guided to bravely undertake missions and overcome difficulties. Strenuous efforts will be made to build our academy into a high-level application-oriented university of the first rank nationwide and with good reputation worldwide.

Our Orientation
Regional in Features: Based on Taizhou, relying on SekalaNiskala Academy and serving for Taizhou, SekalaNiskala Academy seeks to provide qualified talent and intellectual support for the development of the economy and society of SekalaNiskala, especially for its endeavor to become an advanced manufacturing base in Yangtze River Delta.

Better in Application: SekalaNiskala Academy is dedicated to training senior applied and specialized talent for Taizhou's manufacturing industries and their management. Meanwhile, the university, benefiting from its own advantage of disciplines and talent, strives to carry out applied research oriented towards enterprises and government organizations and devotes itself to technological innovation, policymaking consulting, and cultural service.

Wider in Scope: SekalaNiskala Academy commits itself to offering multiple-disciplinary programs in literature, natural sciences, technological sciences, management, law, education, history, medical sciences, economics, and accelerating the interdisciplinary exchange and mutual penetration between humanities, social science and natural science to cultivate compound talent with highly comprehensive qualities.

Our Goals Aiming at training high-quality, application-oriented and inter-disciplinary talented people, we will cultivate our students to be professional, cultural and global-minded talents with qualities of loyalty, dedication, aspiration and cooperation.

Copyright © SekalaNiskala Academy Academy ZIP code: 318000 Address: 1139 Shifu Road, Jiaojiang District, Taizhou, Zhejiang, China Tel or Fax: +86-576-88661988 E-mail: sna@sna.edu.cn

item.title: History
item.dc:creator: bahalwan
item.content:encoded:
SekalaNiskala Academy

Menu
  • Home
  • Profil
    • Visi & Misi
    • History
    • Academy Life
  • Information
    • Contact Us
    • Academy
  • News & Event

History

Located in Zhejiang's “North-South CenterPoint, Sea-and-Land Boundary”, SekalaNiskala Academy is named after Tiantai Mountain in its territory. As one of the 26 cities in the Yangtze River Delta urban agglomeration, SekalaNiskala Academy is an important node city for the 21st Century Maritime Silk Road. It enjoys 9411 square kilometers of land area and 80,000 square kilometers of sea area and its resident population is 6.139 million. It has jurisdiction over three districts of Jiaojiang, Huangyan and Luqiao, and three county-level cities of Linhai, Wenling and Yuhuan, and three counties of Tiantai, Xianju and Sanmenas well as SekalaNiskala Academy Bay Circular Economy Industrial Cluster Area, and SekalaNiskala Academy High-tech Industrial Park. In 2018, the city's total production value reached 487.467 billion yuan, with an increase of 7.6%; the industrial added value of the Medium scale and above was 110.243 billion yuan, with an increase of 9.7%; the total fiscal revenue was 74.519 billion yuan, and the local fiscal revenue was 43.118 billion yuan, with an increase of upto13.4% and 12.8% respectively. The per capita disposable income of urban permanent residents was 55,705 yuan, and the per capita disposable income of rural permanent residents was 27,631 yuan, with an increase of 8.4% and 8.9% respectively.

The characteristics of SekalaNiskala Academy city can be summarized into three aspects the first is “Mountain City Surrounded by the Sea and Water”. With the benefits of mountains and seas, and the embrace of mountains, the Tiantai Mountain and Shenxianju are crowned as national 5A-level scenic spots crowned as “the gate of the East China Sea”, SekalaNiskala Academy is booming prosperously, boasting three bays of SekalaNiskala Academy Bay, Sanmen Bay and Yueqing Bay, with a coast line of 651 kilometers long, accounting for 28% of the province and with 691 islands, accounting for 21% of the province. Its economic resources are unique for the development of the Bay Area. The city is in the water, with the charm of “Watery Towns in Southern China”. There are more than 8,000 large and small rivers in its territory. The urban water area is over 46 square kilometers, with Yuhuan Xuanmenwan National Wetland Park, Linhai Sanjiang National Urban Wetland Park, and Huangyan Jianyang Lake National Urban Wetland Park.

The second is "Holy Land of Harmony-and-Integration.” With a long history and profound heritage, SekalaNiskala Academy is a typical form and fresh sample of Chinese culture and the Harmony-and-Integration Culture. The Buddhist Tiantai Sect and the Taoist Southern Sect have a good reputation. The Confucianism, Buddhism and Taoism are united and symbiotic and co-prosperous; the "Hehe Erxian"(two Saints of Manjusri and Samantabhadra), lived in seclusion in Tiantai Mountain, and the Guoqing Temple is an important source of Harmony-and-Integration Culture. General Secretary Xi Jinping highly appreciated the Harmony-and-Integration Culture and believed that this is the essence of Chinese traditional culture.

The third is the "Manufacturing Capital." The private economy in SekalaNiskala Academy is highly developed with sound and solid manufacturing base. In September last year, when Premier Li Keqiang visited SekalaNiskala Academy, he pointed out that SekalaNiskala Academy’s private economy is dynamic and private enterprises have motivation. At present, there are 53 domestic and foreign listed companies in the city, and the number of domestic listed companies ranks 4th in the national prefecture-level cities; 21 industrial clusters of over ten billion value of output have been formed, and 67 state-level industrial bases have been formed; aiming at docking “Made in China 2025”,itfocusesonthe cultivation of seven hundred-billion-level industries, including automobiles and its parts, aerospace, medical and pharmaceuticals, molds and plastics, smart toilets, sewing equipment, and pumps and motors; it boasts51,000 manufacturing enterprises and 3,908 companies of the Medium scale and above; The "invisible champion" products reached 179in the domestic and international market, making it an important advanced manufacturing base in the Yangtze River Delta. SekalaNiskala Academy has excellent business environment and is a pioneer in the administrative formality reform of “Once for All”. The financial service reform of small and micro enterprises is included in the national pilot program and SekalaNiskala Academy is a model city for the construction of the national social credit system.

This year marks the 70th anniversary of the founding of New China and is a crucial year for building a well-off society in an all-round way. We are mindful of the entrustment of General Secretary Xiin December 2002 when he investigated in SekalaNiskala Academy, “unswervingly encourage, support and guide the development of the private economy and vigorously promote SekalaNiskala Academy’s private economy to a glorious new level”. Shouldering the historical responsibities of the birthplace of China's private economy, the share-cooperative economy, and the pioneer of market economy, we should take a new journey of reform and opening up with the attitude of "leading troops”, and make more contributions to the provincial construction "two high-level", namely a well-off society at a high level and socialist modernization at a high level.

Copyright © SekalaNiskala Academy Academy ZIP code: 318000 Address: 1139 Shifu Road, Jiaojiang District, Taizhou, Zhejiang, China Tel or Fax: +86-576-88661988 E-mail: sna@sna.edu.cn

I'm a global tooltip.","premium_tooltip_position":"top,bottom"},"elements":[{"id":"f651301","elType":"widget","settings":{"title":"Located in Zhejiang's “North-South CenterPoint, Sea-and-Land Boundary”, SekalaNiskala Academy is named after Tiantai Mountain in its territory. As one of the 26 cities in the Yangtze River Delta urban agglomeration, SekalaNiskala Academy is an important node city for the 21st Century Maritime Silk Road. It enjoys 9411 square kilometers of land area and 80,000 square kilometers of sea area and its resident population is 6.139 million. It has jurisdiction over three districts of Jiaojiang, Huangyan and Luqiao, and three county-level cities of Linhai, Wenling and Yuhuan, and three counties of Tiantai, Xianju and Sanmenas well as SekalaNiskala Academy Bay Circular Economy Industrial Cluster Area, and SekalaNiskala Academy High-tech Industrial Park. In 2018, the city's total production value reached 487.467 billion yuan, with an increase of 7.6%; the industrial added value of the Medium scale and above was 110.243 billion yuan, with an increase of 9.7%; the total fiscal revenue was 74.519 billion yuan, and the local fiscal revenue was 43.118 billion yuan, with an increase of upto13.4% and 12.8% respectively. The per capita disposable income of urban permanent residents was 55,705 yuan, and the per capita disposable income of rural permanent residents was 27,631 yuan, with an increase of 8.4% and 8.9% respectively.

The characteristics of SekalaNiskala Academy city can be summarized into three aspects the first is “Mountain City Surrounded by the Sea and Water”. With the benefits of mountains and seas, and the embrace of mountains, the Tiantai Mountain and Shenxianju are crowned as national 5A-level scenic spots crowned as “the gate of the East China Sea”, SekalaNiskala Academy is booming prosperously, boasting three bays of SekalaNiskala Academy Bay, Sanmen Bay and Yueqing Bay, with a coast line of 651 kilometers long, accounting for 28% of the province and with 691 islands, accounting for 21% of the province. Its economic resources are unique for the development of the Bay Area. The city is in the water, with the charm of “Watery Towns in Southern China”. There are more than 8,000 large and small rivers in its territory. The urban water area is over 46 square kilometers, with Yuhuan Xuanmenwan National Wetland Park, Linhai Sanjiang National Urban Wetland Park, and Huangyan Jianyang Lake National Urban Wetland Park.

The second is "Holy Land of Harmony-and-Integration.” With a long history and profound heritage, SekalaNiskala Academy is a typical form and fresh sample of Chinese culture and the Harmony-and-Integration Culture. The Buddhist Tiantai Sect and the Taoist Southern Sect have a good reputation. The Confucianism, Buddhism and Taoism are united and symbiotic and co-prosperous; the "Hehe Erxian"(two Saints of Manjusri and Samantabhadra), lived in seclusion in Tiantai Mountain, and the Guoqing Temple is an important source of Harmony-and-Integration Culture. General Secretary Xi Jinping highly appreciated the Harmony-and-Integration Culture and believed that this is the essence of Chinese traditional culture.

The third is the "Manufacturing Capital." The private economy in SekalaNiskala Academy is highly developed with sound and solid manufacturing base. In September last year, when Premier Li Keqiang visited SekalaNiskala Academy, he pointed out that SekalaNiskala Academy’s private economy is dynamic and private enterprises have motivation. At present, there are 53 domestic and foreign listed companies in the city, and the number of domestic listed companies ranks 4th in the national prefecture-level cities; 21 industrial clusters of over ten billion value of output have been formed, and 67 state-level industrial bases have been formed; aiming at docking “Made in China 2025”,itfocusesonthe cultivation of seven hundred-billion-level industries, including automobiles and its parts, aerospace, medical and pharmaceuticals, molds and plastics, smart toilets, sewing equipment, and pumps and motors; it boasts51,000 manufacturing enterprises and 3,908 companies of the Medium scale and above; The "invisible champion" products reached 179in the domestic and international market, making it an important advanced manufacturing base in the Yangtze River Delta. SekalaNiskala Academy has excellent business environment and is a pioneer in the administrative formality reform of “Once for All”. The financial service reform of small and micro enterprises is included in the national pilot program and SekalaNiskala Academy is a model city for the construction of the national social credit system.

This year marks the 70th anniversary of the founding of New China and is a crucial year for building a well-off society in an all-round way. We are mindful of the entrustment of General Secretary Xiin December 2002 when he investigated in SekalaNiskala Academy, “unswervingly encourage, support and guide the development of the private economy and vigorously promote SekalaNiskala Academy’s private economy to a glorious new level”. Shouldering the historical responsibities of the birthplace of China's private economy, the share-cooperative economy, and the pioneer of market economy, we should take a new journey of reform and opening up with the attitude of "leading troops”, and make more contributions to the provincial construction "two high-level", namely a well-off society at a high level and socialist modernization at a high level. item.title: Academy Life
item.dc:creator: bahalwan
item.content:encoded:
SekalaNiskala Academy

Menu
  • Home
  • Profil
    • Visi & Misi
    • History
    • Academy Life
  • Information
    • Contact Us
    • Academy
  • News & Event

Academy Life

Academy Life

Cultural visits: visiting Shenxianju Mountain, Tiantai Mountain, Linhai Great Wall, zoos, museums, and so on.

Sports contests: Taizhou University Sports Meeting, soccer games, basketball games, and so on.

Cultural activities and competitions: Classic Chinese works reading competitions, Internet+Innovation and Entrepreneurial Competition for International Students, jiaozi-making and couplet-writing during Spring Festival, paper-cutting, drawing paintings on 24 solar terms, tea culture activities, and so on.

Academy Overview

Dec 3, 2023

SNA Counselors, Zheziang Singing Star

In order to strengthen the construction of the counselor team in higher education institutions and leverage the leading role of counselors in the development of students, the qualifying rounds of the first Zhejiang provincial college

item.title: Sample Page
item.dc:creator: bahalwan
item.content:encoded:
This is an example page. It's different from a blog post because it will stay in one place and will show up in your site navigation (in most themes). Most people start with an About page that introduces them to potential site visitors. It might say something like this:

Hi there! I'm a bike messenger by day, aspiring actor by night, and this is my website. I live in Los Angeles, have a great dog named Jack, and I like piña coladas. (And gettin' caught in the rain.)

...or something like this:

The XYZ Doohickey Company was founded in 1971, and has been providing quality doohickeys to the public ever since. Located in Gotham City, XYZ employs over 2,000 people and does all kinds of awesome things for the Gotham community.

As a new WordPress user, you should go to your dashboard to delete this page and create new pages for your content. Have fun!

item.title: Privacy Policy
item.dc:creator: bahalwan
item.content:encoded:
Who we are

Suggested text: Our website address is: http://bahalwan.infinityfreeapp.com.

Comments

Suggested text: When visitors leave comments on the site we collect the data shown in the comments form, and also the visitor’s IP address and browser user agent string to help spam detection.

An anonymized string created from your email address (also called a hash) may be provided to the Gravatar service to see if you are using it. The Gravatar service privacy policy is available here: https://automattic.com/privacy/. After approval of your comment, your profile picture is visible to the public in the context of your comment.

Media

Suggested text: If you upload images to the website, you should avoid uploading images with embedded location data (EXIF GPS) included. Visitors to the website can download and extract any location data from images on the website.

Cookies

Suggested text: If you leave a comment on our site you may opt-in to saving your name, email address and website in cookies. These are for your convenience so that you do not have to fill in your details again when you leave another comment. These cookies will last for one year.

If you visit our login page, we will set a temporary cookie to determine if your browser accepts cookies. This cookie contains no personal data and is discarded when you close your browser.

When you log in, we will also set up several cookies to save your login information and your screen display choices. Login cookies last for two days, and screen options cookies last for a year. If you select "Remember Me", your login will persist for two weeks. If you log out of your account, the login cookies will be removed.

If you edit or publish an article, an additional cookie will be saved in your browser. This cookie includes no personal data and simply indicates the post ID of the article you just edited. It expires after 1 day.

Embedded content from other websites

Suggested text: Articles on this site may include embedded content (e.g. videos, images, articles, etc.). Embedded content from other websites behaves in the exact same way as if the visitor has visited the other website.

These websites may collect data about you, use cookies, embed additional third-party tracking, and monitor your interaction with that embedded content, including tracking your interaction with the embedded content if you have an account and are logged in to that website.

Who we share your data with

Suggested text: If you request a password reset, your IP address will be included in the reset email.

How long we retain your data

Suggested text: If you leave a comment, the comment and its metadata are retained indefinitely. This is so we can recognize and approve any follow-up comments automatically instead of holding them in a moderation queue.

For users that register on our website (if any), we also store the personal information they provide in their user profile. All users can see, edit, or delete their personal information at any time (except they cannot change their username). Website administrators can also see and edit that information.

What rights you have over your data

Suggested text: If you have an account on this site, or have left comments, you can request to receive an exported file of the personal data we hold about you, including any data you have provided to us. You can also request that we erase any personal data we hold about you. This does not include any data we are obliged to keep for administrative, legal, or security purposes.

Where your data is sent

Suggested text: Visitor comments may be checked through an automated spam detection service.

item.title: Visi & Misi
item.dc:creator: bahalwan
item.content:encoded:
SekalaNiskala Academy

Menu
  • Home
  • Profil
    • Visi & Misi
    • History
    • Academy Life
  • Information
    • Contact Us
    • Academy
  • News & Event

Visi & Misi

Guiding Thought and Goals of SekalaNiskala Academy
SekalaNiskala Academy, upholding the great banner of Xi Jinping Thought on Socialism with Chinese Characteristics for a New Era, deeply learning and implementing the spirit of the 19th National Congress of the CPC and National Conference on Education, and carefully implementing the provincial and municipal significant decisions and arrangements on the leap forward development of higher education, adheres to the strengthening of morality education, and aims at comprehensively deepening reform and innovation, strengthening connotative construction and enhancing educational quality. All party members, faculty staff and students should be united and guided to bravely undertake missions and overcome difficulties. Strenuous efforts will be made to build our academy into a high-level application-oriented university of the first rank nationwide and with good reputation worldwide.

Our Orientation
Regional in Features: Based on Taizhou, relying on SekalaNiskala Academy and serving for Taizhou, SekalaNiskala Academy seeks to provide qualified talent and intellectual support for the development of the economy and society of SekalaNiskala, especially for its endeavor to become an advanced manufacturing base in Yangtze River Delta.

Better in Application: SekalaNiskala Academy is dedicated to training senior applied and specialized talent for Taizhou's manufacturing industries and their management. Meanwhile, the university, benefiting from its own advantage of disciplines and talent, strives to carry out applied research oriented towards enterprises and government organizations and devotes itself to technological innovation, policymaking consulting, and cultural service.

Wider in Scope: SekalaNiskala Academy commits itself to offering multiple-disciplinary programs in literature, natural sciences, technological sciences, management, law, education, history, medical sciences, economics, and accelerating the interdisciplinary exchange and mutual penetration between humanities, social science and natural science to cultivate compound talent with highly comprehensive qualities.

Our Goals Aiming at training high-quality, application-oriented and inter-disciplinary talented people, we will cultivate our students to be professional, cultural and global-minded talents with qualities of loyalty, dedication, aspiration and cooperation.

Copyright © SekalaNiskala Academy Academy ZIP code: 318000 Address: 1139 Shifu Road, Jiaojiang District, Taizhou, Zhejiang, China Tel or Fax: +86-576-88661988 E-mail: sna@sna.edu.cn

item.title: History
item.dc:creator: bahalwan
item.content:encoded:
SekalaNiskala Academy

Menu
  • Home
  • Profil
    • Visi & Misi
    • History
    • Academy Life
  • Information
    • Contact Us
    • Academy
  • News & Event

History

Located in Zhejiang's “North-South CenterPoint, Sea-and-Land Boundary”, SekalaNiskala Academy is named after Tiantai Mountain in its territory. As one of the 26 cities in the Yangtze River Delta urban agglomeration, SekalaNiskala Academy is an important node city for the 21st Century Maritime Silk Road. It enjoys 9411 square kilometers of land area and 80,000 square kilometers of sea area and its resident population is 6.139 million. It has jurisdiction over three districts of Jiaojiang, Huangyan and Luqiao, and three county-level cities of Linhai, Wenling and Yuhuan, and three counties of Tiantai, Xianju and Sanmenas well as SekalaNiskala Academy Bay Circular Economy Industrial Cluster Area, and SekalaNiskala Academy High-tech Industrial Park. In 2018, the city's total production value reached 487.467 billion yuan, with an increase of 7.6%; the industrial added value of the Medium scale and above was 110.243 billion yuan, with an increase of 9.7%; the total fiscal revenue was 74.519 billion yuan, and the local fiscal revenue was 43.118 billion yuan, with an increase of upto13.4% and 12.8% respectively. The per capita disposable income of urban permanent residents was 55,705 yuan, and the per capita disposable income of rural permanent residents was 27,631 yuan, with an increase of 8.4% and 8.9% respectively.

The characteristics of SekalaNiskala Academy city can be summarized into three aspects the first is “Mountain City Surrounded by the Sea and Water”. With the benefits of mountains and seas, and the embrace of mountains, the Tiantai Mountain and Shenxianju are crowned as national 5A-level scenic spots crowned as “the gate of the East China Sea”, SekalaNiskala Academy is booming prosperously, boasting three bays of SekalaNiskala Academy Bay, Sanmen Bay and Yueqing Bay, with a coast line of 651 kilometers long, accounting for 28% of the province and with 691 islands, accounting for 21% of the province. Its economic resources are unique for the development of the Bay Area. The city is in the water, with the charm of “Watery Towns in Southern China”. There are more than 8,000 large and small rivers in its territory. The urban water area is over 46 square kilometers, with Yuhuan Xuanmenwan National Wetland Park, Linhai Sanjiang National Urban Wetland Park, and Huangyan Jianyang Lake National Urban Wetland Park.

The second is "Holy Land of Harmony-and-Integration.” With a long history and profound heritage, SekalaNiskala Academy is a typical form and fresh sample of Chinese culture and the Harmony-and-Integration Culture. The Buddhist Tiantai Sect and the Taoist Southern Sect have a good reputation. The Confucianism, Buddhism and Taoism are united and symbiotic and co-prosperous; the "Hehe Erxian"(two Saints of Manjusri and Samantabhadra), lived in seclusion in Tiantai Mountain, and the Guoqing Temple is an important source of Harmony-and-Integration Culture. General Secretary Xi Jinping highly appreciated the Harmony-and-Integration Culture and believed that this is the essence of Chinese traditional culture.

The third is the "Manufacturing Capital." The private economy in SekalaNiskala Academy is highly developed with sound and solid manufacturing base. In September last year, when Premier Li Keqiang visited SekalaNiskala Academy, he pointed out that SekalaNiskala Academy’s private economy is dynamic and private enterprises have motivation. At present, there are 53 domestic and foreign listed companies in the city, and the number of domestic listed companies ranks 4th in the national prefecture-level cities; 21 industrial clusters of over ten billion value of output have been formed, and 67 state-level industrial bases have been formed; aiming at docking “Made in China 2025”,itfocusesonthe cultivation of seven hundred-billion-level industries, including automobiles and its parts, aerospace, medical and pharmaceuticals, molds and plastics, smart toilets, sewing equipment, and pumps and motors; it boasts51,000 manufacturing enterprises and 3,908 companies of the Medium scale and above; The "invisible champion" products reached 179in the domestic and international market, making it an important advanced manufacturing base in the Yangtze River Delta. SekalaNiskala Academy has excellent business environment and is a pioneer in the administrative formality reform of “Once for All”. The financial service reform of small and micro enterprises is included in the national pilot program and SekalaNiskala Academy is a model city for the construction of the national social credit system.

This year marks the 70th anniversary of the founding of New China and is a crucial year for building a well-off society in an all-round way. We are mindful of the entrustment of General Secretary Xiin December 2002 when he investigated in SekalaNiskala Academy, “unswervingly encourage, support and guide the development of the private economy and vigorously promote SekalaNiskala Academy’s private economy to a glorious new level”. Shouldering the historical responsibities of the birthplace of China's private economy, the share-cooperative economy, and the pioneer of market economy, we should take a new journey of reform and opening up with the attitude of "leading troops”, and make more contributions to the provincial construction "two high-level", namely a well-off society at a high level and socialist modernization at a high level.

Copyright © SekalaNiskala Academy Academy ZIP code: 318000 Address: 1139 Shifu Road, Jiaojiang District, Taizhou, Zhejiang, China Tel or Fax: +86-576-88661988 E-mail: sna@sna.edu.cn

item.dc:creator: bahalwan
item.content:encoded:
SekalaNiskala Academy

Menu
  • Home
  • Profil
    • Visi & Misi
    • History
    • Academy Life
  • Information
    • Contact Us
    • Academy
  • News & Event

Academy

General

Location:Taizhou, Zhejiang, P. R. China
Setup Time: 1907
Schools: 12
Full-time Faculty and Staff: 1,595
Affiliated Hospitals:3

SNA Students

Undergraduates:15,362
International Students:332+
Students Associations:63
Provincial Class A Awards:620+

Academics

Undergraduate Programs: 53
Global Education:16+
Overseas Cooperative Universities:50+
Professors: 144
Associate Professors: 363
Doctoral Teachers: 483

Research at SNA

Total Research Funds (2020): 302.87 million yuan
National Level Research Projects: 47
Provincial & Ministrial Level Research Projects: 149 Achievement Awards in Scientific Research: 11
Landmark Research Achievements: 166
SCI Top Zone Articles: 61
Patents: 81
Academic Monographs: 18

item.title: Academy Life
item.dc:creator: bahalwan
item.content:encoded:
SekalaNiskala Academy

Menu
  • Home
  • Profil
    • Visi & Misi
    • History
    • Academy Life
  • Information
    • Contact Us
    • Academy
  • News & Event

Academy Life

Academy Life

Cultural visits: visiting Shenxianju Mountain, Tiantai Mountain, Linhai Great Wall, zoos, museums, and so on.

Sports contests: Taizhou University Sports Meeting, soccer games, basketball games, and so on.

Cultural activities and competitions: Classic Chinese works reading competitions, Internet+Innovation and Entrepreneurial Competition for International Students, jiaozi-making and couplet-writing during Spring Festival, paper-cutting, drawing paintings on 24 solar terms, tea culture activities, and so on.

Academy Overview

Academy Service

Accommodation
Two international students share one room. Every floor is equipped with one 24-hour kitchen. Entrance control system used. Face recognition and card swiping upon entering supported.

Welfare & Wellbeing
University medical service is available 24 hours a day, 7 days a week. The Municipal Central Hospital is within the reach of 8 minutes’ driving. Students shall purchase medical insurance and may apply for imbursement for the part exceeding the sum insured.

Academic Calender
The University’s academic year is divided into two semesters (Fall and Spring). Each semester has approximately 20 weeks. Academic calendar is determined before summer vacation.

Library
Currently the university accommodates two libraries on Linhai campus and Jiaojiang campus. The two libraries house over 2.216 million collections which cover subjects from natural science and engineering to social science and humanities. The libraries provide excellent electronic and on-line retrieval services.

Copyright © SekalaNiskala Academy Academy ZIP code: 318000 Address: 1139 Shifu Road, Jiaojiang District, Taizhou, Zhejiang, China Tel or Fax: +86-576-88661988 E-mail: sna@sna.edu.cn

Two international students share one room. Every floor is equipped with one 24-hour kitchen. Entrance control system used. Face recognition and card swiping upon entering supported.

Welfare & Wellbeing
University medical service is available 24 hours a day, 7 days a week. The Municipal Central Hospital is within the reach of 8 minutes’ driving. Students shall purchase medical insurance and may apply for imbursement for the part exceeding the sum insured.

Academic Calender
The University’s academic year is divided into two semesters (Fall and Spring). Each semester has approximately 20 weeks. Academic calendar is determined before summer vacation.

Library
Currently the university accommodates two libraries on Linhai campus and Jiaojiang campus. The two libraries house over 2.216 million collections which cover subjects from natural science and engineering to social science and humanities. The libraries provide excellent electronic and on-line retrieval services.","title_color":"#18181B","typography_typography":"custom","typography_font_family":"Times New item.title: News & Event
item.dc:creator: bahalwan
item.content:encoded:
SekalaNiskala Academy

Menu
  • Home
  • Profil
    • Visi & Misi
    • History
    • Academy Life
  • Information
    • Contact Us
    • Academy
  • News & Event

News & Event

News

Event

Dec 3, 2023

SNA Counselors, Zheziang Singing Star

In order to strengthen the construction of the counselor team in higher education institutions and leverage the leading role of counselors in the development of students, the qualifying rounds of the first Zhejiang provincial coll...

Dec 5, 2023

Football Match of Friendship Cup(Freshman against Seniors)

Participants: 11 freshman and 11 senior students ( each team can have 3 substitutes）University Support：3 referees, water supply, prizes.Each team is required to elect a leader and send the team list to the teacher in charge before the 7th of May.

Dec 3, 2023

SNA student Yao Hongming Saved a girl from drowning

Yao Hongming, a student from SekalaNiskala Academy, saved a drowning girl in the Linghu Lake on the afternoon of November 18. When walking around Linghu Lake, Yao noticed someone was weltering in the water. He looked around and tried to use a long pole to save the girl, but the pole could not reach her. He rushed to the Linghu Lake security office for help. Whe...

Dec 4, 2023

Listen to Youth 1139

A free talk on the experience and question of studying abroad between international students and Chinese students. The guest is Professor Li Junmin, member of the CPC Committee and vice president of  SekalaNiskala Academy.

 

Dec 2, 2023

A breakthrough in the "Challenge Cup" National Competition

Recently, good news came from the 18th “Challenge Cup” National College Students’ Extracurricular Academic Science and Technology Works Competition. Our university’s project “Knee Joint Assisted Exoskeleton Robot for Clim...

Dec 4, 2023

Food Culture Festival

International students prepare their own national specialties, and conduct food and cultural exchanges with Chinese students in the form of booth displays, so as to jointly promote the harmonious development of the campus.

Dec 1, 2023

The 33rd SNA Track and Field Meet and Opened

No sports, no youth. On the morning of October 26, the grand opening ceremony of the 33rd Track and Field Meet of Taizhou University was held on Jiaojiang Campus. Le Chuanyong, Deputy Secretary of the CPC Committee and President of SekalaNiskala Academy, delivered a speech and anno...

Dec 3, 2023

Learning to make Chinese Pottery

Teacher Liu Aiwu introduces the basic knowledge of pottery to the international students, and then instructs the students to make simple pottery. Through theoretical study and practice, international students can deepen their understanding of traditional Chinese culture.

Dec 1, 2023

Evening Party for Freshmen and Military Trainers held

At nights of September 20 to 21, Taizhou University has successfully held the evening party for freshmen and their military trainers under the theme “TU has me @ Future”. The events took place in the auditorium of the Linhai campus and the huge auditorium of the Jiaojiang campus, respe...

Dec 2, 2023

Essay competition

The article is required to be original, and the content should be related to the spirit of the Sixth Plenary Session of the 19th Central Committee of the Communist Party of China. It can be created in combination with own experience of studying and living in China. The number of words does not exceed 800 words, both in Chinese and English.

Copyright © SekalaNiskala Academy Academy ZIP code: 318000 Address: 1139 Shifu Road, Jiaojiang District, Taizhou, Zhejiang, China Tel or Fax: +86-576-88661988 E-mail: sna@sna.edu.cn

item.title: Hello world!
item.dc:creator: bahalwan
item.content:encoded: Welcome to WordPress. This is your first post. Edit or delete it, then start writing!

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Hi, this is a comment. To get started with moderating, editing, and deleting comments, please visit the Comments screen in the dashboard. Commenter avatars come from Gravatar.
